AppDB.Name: OAMP_MEP_DB
AppDB.OneLineDescription: OAMP MEP DB entries in multiple formats

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: Loss measurement data. Use only for self-contained.

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: Loss measurement statistics. Use only for self-contained.

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: Two-way delay measurement statistics. Use only for self-contained.

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: Extended data - header entry. Use only for self-contained.

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: Extended data - payload entry. Use only for self-contained.

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: One-way delay measurement statistics. Use only for self-contained.

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: Offloaded format - first entry. At least two MDB entries required.

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: Offloaded format - optional second entry. Set Offloaded and q_entry.

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.Description: 1/4 Entry OAM CCM down-MEP, MPLSTP or PWE

AppDB.Name: OAMP_ITMH_PRIORITY_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map to ITMH TC and DP

AppDB.Name: OAMP_OAM_SA_MAC_MSB_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: SA MAC(33 MSB bits) for CCM packets

AppDB.Name: OAMP_LOCAL_PORT_2_SYSTEM_PORT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping Local Port to System Port

AppDB.Name: OAMP_OAM_TPID_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map MEP DB Index to TPID
